ai-patthana15.31:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.31:0.3_0: doing what is skillful and what is good,
ai-patthana15.31:1.1_0: A way of deceitfulness doesn’t give rise to a skillful quality, with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.31:2.1_0: A way of deceitfulness doesn’t give rise to a thought ...
ai-patthana15.31:3.1_0: Or if they haven’t known something or seen because of an undecided perseverance ...
ai-patthana15.31:4.1_0: The thighs on the inside, is finished.
